Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Golden Dolphin Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Riverdell Way and Golden Dolphin Way.
Room.LongDescription: Golden Dolphin Way runs west from here, running parallel to the City Walls on the south side of the road. Riverdell Way runs north through the main parts of the city. To the south, you can see the South Oceancrest Observational Station, a large guard station at the southern end of the city.
